description_en: Red squirrels are not always red; sometimes they can be black, brown or even white in colour. Baby red squirrels are called kittens. Red squirrels can swim and hang upside down! Reds don’t hibernate; in winter they rely on food that they have previously buried and they can locate their food supplies in over 1 foot of snow.
description_sb: Crvene veverice nisu uvek crvene; ponekad mogu biti crne, smeđe ili čak bele boje. Bebe crvene veverice zovu se mačići. Crvene veverice mogu plivati i visiti naopačke! Ne hiberniraju; zimi se oslanjaju na hranu koju su prethodno zakopali i zalihe hrane mogu da pronađu u snegu dubokom preko 30 centimetara.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Norway maples have dense shallow roots and produce heavy shade that prevents grass from growing under them. Occasionally, the roots will even choke the parent tree. The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: Red squirrels are not always red; sometimes they can be black, brown or even white in colour. Baby red squirrels are called kittens. Red squirrels can swim and hang upside down! Reds don’t hibernate; in winter they rely on food that they have previously buried and they can locate their food supplies in over 1 foot of snow.
description_sb: Crvene veverice nisu uvek crvene; ponekad mogu biti crne, smeđe ili čak bele boje. Bebe crvene veverice zovu se mačići. Crvene veverice mogu plivati i visiti naopačke! Ne hiberniraju; zimi se oslanjaju na hranu koju su prethodno zakopali i zalihe hrane mogu da pronađu u snegu dubokom preko 30 centimetara.

description_en: The brown bear can reach a weight of between 330 and 815 pounds. Despite their weight, bears cover short distances at speeds of up to 31 mph. At birth, bear cubs are blind and naked. In the wild, these omnivores spend up to 16 hours per day looking for food. Bears have a particularly good nose: their sense of smell enables them to sniff food at a distance of several miles. The brown bear is the largest predator still living on the continent of Europe.
description_sb: Mrki medved može dostići težinu između 330 i 815 kilograma. Uprkos težini, medvedi prelaze kratke razdaljine brzinom do 50 kilo,etara na sat. Po rođenju medvedići su slepi i goli. U divljini ovi svaštojedi dnevno provodu i do 16 sati tražeći hranu. Medvedi imaju posebno dobar nos: njuh im omogućava da njuškaju hranu na udaljenosti od nekoliko kilometara. Mrki medved je najveći predator koji još uvek živi na evropskom kontinentu.

description_en: Hedgehog has elongated snout and body covered with 5000 to 6500 quills. It covers its quills with foamy saliva after exposure to strong, unpleasant smell or taste. Hedgehog has poor eyesight, but excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food. Its diet is based on insects, centipedes, mice, slugs, snails, caterpillars, frogs, mushrooms and berries. Hedgehog is fast animal, agile climber and good swimmer. When it cannot escape from a danger, hedgehog curls its body into a ball (to protect head, feet and belly) and exposes its quills toward the predator.
description_sb: Jež ima iduženu njušku I telo koje je pokriveno sa 5000 do 6500 bodlji. Bodlje prekriva penušavom pljuvačkom nakon izlaganja jakom, neprijatnom, mirisu ili ukusu. Jež ima loš vid, ali izuzetno čulo sluha I mirisa koje mu olakšavaju potragu hanom. Njegova ishrana s zasniva se na insektima, stonogama, miševima, puževima, gusenicama, žabama, pečurkama i bobicama. Jež je brza životinja, spretan penjač i dobar plivač. Kada ne može da izbegne opasnost, jež savija svoje telo u kuglu (da bi zaštitio glavu, stopala i stomak) i uperi svoje bodlje prema grabljivici.

description_en: Red squirrels are not always red; sometimes they can be black, brown or even white in colour. Baby red squirrels are called kittens. Red squirrels can swim and hang upside down! Reds don’t hibernate; in winter they rely on food that they have previously buried and they can locate their food supplies in over 1 foot of snow.
description_sb: Crvene veverice nisu uvek crvene; ponekad mogu biti crne, smeđe ili čak bele boje. Bebe crvene veverice zovu se mačići. Crvene veverice mogu plivati i visiti naopačke! Ne hiberniraju; zimi se oslanjaju na hranu koju su prethodno zakopali i zalihe hrane mogu da pronađu u snegu dubokom preko 30 centimetara.

description_en: Hare can leap up to 10 feet and reach the speed of 35 to 40 miles per hour thanks to its long, strong hind legs. It is also excellent swimmer. Its diet is based on the grass, fern, seed and vegetables. Hare has excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food and predators.
description_sb: Zec može da skoči do 3 metra i postigne brzinu od 55 do 65 kilometara na sat zahvaljujući dugim, snažnim zadnjim nogama. Takođe je odličan plivač. Njegova se ishrana zasniva na travi, paprati, semenu i povrću. Zec ima izvrsna čula sluha i mirisa koja olakšavaju otkrivanje hrane i grabljivica.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.
description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: Eagle has large eyes with very large pupils. It has 5 times more light-sensitive cells in the eyes than humans and ability to recognize 5 basic colors (humans can recognize only 3). Thanks to its keen eyesight, eagle can spot small and well-camouflaged prey (such as rabbit) from a distance of nearly two miles. Eagle is a carnivore. Its diet is based on lizards, small mammals, fish and carrion. Eagle "lands" on the prey at the speed of 150 miles per hour and kills it with its sharp claws and beak.
description_sb: Orao ima velike oči sa vrlo velikim zenicama. Ima 5 puta više ćelija osetljivih na svetlost u očima od ljudi i sposobnost prepoznavanja 5 osnovnih boja (ljudi mogu prepoznati samo 3). Zahvaljujući izoštrenom vidu, orao može uočiti mali i dobro zakamufliran plen (poput zeca) sa udaljenosti od tri kilometara. Orao je mesožder. Njegova ishrana zasniva se na gušterima, malim sisarima, ribi i strvini. Orao „sleće“ na plen brzinom od 240 kilometara na sat i ubija ga oštrim kandžama i kljunom.

description_en: Mole is adapted for the life under the ground. It can dig 18-feet-long tunnel in one hour. Mole has poor eyesight, but it is not blind. It uses keen sense of smell to detect the prey. It has mixed diet based on the earthworms, spiders, grubs and different plants. Mole has huge appetite: daily intake of food exceeds half of its own body weight. Mole can perform somersault and run backwards when it is faced with danger. It can reach the speed of 80 feet per minute when it needs to escape from the predators.
description_sb: Krtica je prilagođena za život pod zemljom. Za jedan sat može prokopati tunel dug 5,5 metara. Krtica slabo vidi, ali nije slepa. Koristi izoštren njuh za otkrivanje plena. Njena ishrana je mešana i zasnovana na glistama, paucima, lišćima i različitim biljkama. Krtica ima ogroman apetit: dnevno unose hrane za vise od polovinu sopstvene težine. Krtica može da izvrši salto i trči unazad kada se suoči sa opasnošću. Može da dostigne brzinu od 25 metara u minuti kada treba da pobegne grabljivicama.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Norway maples have dense shallow roots and produce heavy shade that prevents grass from growing under them. Occasionally, the roots will even choke the parent tree. The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: Wild boar can reach 3 to 6.5 feet in length, 21.6 to 39.3 inches in height and 90 to 700 pounds in weight. It has long, rubbery snout that is used for digging of underground roots and bulbs. It feeds mainly on the seed, fruits, leaves, berries, eggs, mice, lizards, worms and snakes. Wild boars are nocturnal animals. They will spend 12h in sleep during the day, hidden in the nests made of leaves.
description_sb: Divlja svinja može dostići dižinu od 0,9 do 2 metra, visinu od 0,5 do 1 metra i težinu od 40 do 317 kilograma. Ima dugačku gumenastu njušku kojom iskopava podzemne iskopava korene i lukovice. Uglavnom sehrani semenjem, voćem, lišćem, bovicama, jajima, miševima, gušterima, crvima i zmijama. Tokom dana provedu i do 12 sati spavajući sakrivene u gnezdu napravljenom od lišća.

description_en: Foxes share some similarities with cats. They have retractable claws (which can be pulled inside the paws) and vertical pupils. Foxes see well at dim light. Besides good night eyesight, foxes have excellent sense of smell and hearing. They use these senses to detect the prey. Foxes prefer meat and they will readily hunt birds (including poultry), rodents, small mammals and reptiles. They are also able to dig and eat human waste and different types of fruit and berries. Foxes can run very fast (up to 30 miles per hour) thanks to their slender body.
description_sb: Lisice dele neke sličnosti sa mačkama. Imaju uvlačne kandže (koje se mogu uvući unutar šapa) i vertikalne zenice. Lisice dobro vide pri slabom svetlu. Osim lakog, lisice imaju i odličan njuh i sluh. Ova čula koriste za otkrivanje plena. Lisice vole meso i stoga će loviti ptice (uključujući živinu), glodare, male sisare i gmizavce. Takođe su u stanju da kopaju i jedu ljudski otpad i različite vrste voća i bobica. Lisice mogu trčati vrlo brzo (do 50 kilometara na sat) zahvaljujući vitkom telu.

description_en: Hedgehog has elongated snout and body covered with 5000 to 6500 quills. It covers its quills with foamy saliva after exposure to strong, unpleasant smell or taste. Hedgehog has poor eyesight, but excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food. Its diet is based on insects, centipedes, mice, slugs, snails, caterpillars, frogs, mushrooms and berries. Hedgehog is fast animal, agile climber and good swimmer. When it cannot escape from a danger, hedgehog curls its body into a ball (to protect head, feet and belly) and exposes its quills toward the predator.
description_sb: Jež ima iduženu njušku I telo koje je pokriveno sa 5000 do 6500 bodlji. Bodlje prekriva penušavom pljuvačkom nakon izlaganja jakom, neprijatnom, mirisu ili ukusu. Jež ima loš vid, ali izuzetno čulo sluha I mirisa koje mu olakšavaju potragu hanom. Njegova ishrana s zasniva se na insektima, stonogama, miševima, puževima, gusenicama, žabama, pečurkama i bobicama. Jež je brza životinja, spretan penjač i dobar plivač. Kada ne može da izbegne opasnost, jež savija svoje telo u kuglu (da bi zaštitio glavu, stopala i stomak) i uperi svoje bodlje prema grabljivici.

description_en: European ground squirrel eats a primarily herbivorous diet made up of grasses, roots, and seeds, along with some insects, which they carry in their cheeks to eat in the safety of the den. During foraging, some individuals act as sentinels, alerting the colony to danger with a whistling call. Unfortunately, the European ground squirrel is threatened and has declined or disappeared over much of its range.
description_sb: Evropska veverica je prvenstveno biljojed, ishrana joj se sastoji od trava, korena i semena, zajedno sa nekim insektima, koje nose u obrazima da bi ih jeli u sigurnim jazbinama. Tokom traženja hrane, neke jedinke imaju ulogu stražara, zviždukom upozoravajući koloniju na opasnost. Na žalost, evropska zemaljska veverica je ugrožena i njena populacija je opala ili nestala sa većeg dela svog staništa.

Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.

Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: Norway maples have dense shallow roots and produce heavy shade that prevents grass from growing under them. Occasionally, the roots will even choke the parent tree. The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Badger is active during the night. Their diet is based on earthworms, insects, slugs, fruit, berries and bulbs. Badger can run short distances at the speed of 19 miles per hour. They are social animals that live in groups, called clans (or cete), of 2 to 15 animals. Badger digs underground burrows called "setts" that consist of network of tunnels and chambers that are used for resting and rearing of young. 6 animals usually share one sett. Some setts in the wild are centuries old and still in use.
description_sb: Jazavac je aktivan tokom noći. Njihova ishrana zasniva se na glistama, insektima, puževima, voću, bobicama i lukovicama. Jazavac može trčati na kratke staze brzinom od 30 kilometara na sat. To su društvene životinje koje žive u grupama, zvanim klanovi, od 2 do 15 životinja. Jazavac kopa podzemne jame koje se sastoje od mreže tunela i komora koje služe za odmor i uzgoj mladunaca. 6 životinja obično deli jedno naselje. Neke jazbine u divljini su stare vekovima i još uvek se koriste.

description_en: Hare can leap up to 10 feet and reach the speed of 35 to 40 miles per hour thanks to its long, strong hind legs. It is also excellent swimmer. Its diet is based on the grass, fern, seed and vegetables. Hare has excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food and predators.
description_sb: Zec može da skoči do 3 metra i postigne brzinu od 55 do 65 kilometara na sat zahvaljujući dugim, snažnim zadnjim nogama. Takođe je odličan plivač. Njegova se ishrana zasniva na travi, paprati, semenu i povrću. Zec ima izvrsna čula sluha i mirisa koja olakšavaju otkrivanje hrane i grabljivica.

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.
description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: Red squirrels are not always red; sometimes they can be black, brown or even white in colour. Baby red squirrels are called kittens. Red squirrels can swim and hang upside down! Reds don’t hibernate; in winter they rely on food that they have previously buried and they can locate their food supplies in over 1 foot of snow.
description_sb: Crvene veverice nisu uvek crvene; ponekad mogu biti crne, smeđe ili čak bele boje. Bebe crvene veverice zovu se mačići. Crvene veverice mogu plivati i visiti naopačke! Ne hiberniraju; zimi se oslanjaju na hranu koju su prethodno zakopali i zalihe hrane mogu da pronađu u snegu dubokom preko 30 centimetara.

description_en: Hedgehog has elongated snout and body covered with 5000 to 6500 quills. It covers its quills with foamy saliva after exposure to strong, unpleasant smell or taste. Hedgehog has poor eyesight, but excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food. Its diet is based on insects, centipedes, mice, slugs, snails, caterpillars, frogs, mushrooms and berries. Hedgehog is fast animal, agile climber and good swimmer. When it cannot escape from a danger, hedgehog curls its body into a ball (to protect head, feet and belly) and exposes its quills toward the predator.
description_sb: Jež ima iduženu njušku I telo koje je pokriveno sa 5000 do 6500 bodlji. Bodlje prekriva penušavom pljuvačkom nakon izlaganja jakom, neprijatnom, mirisu ili ukusu. Jež ima loš vid, ali izuzetno čulo sluha I mirisa koje mu olakšavaju potragu hanom. Njegova ishrana s zasniva se na insektima, stonogama, miševima, puževima, gusenicama, žabama, pečurkama i bobicama. Jež je brza životinja, spretan penjač i dobar plivač. Kada ne može da izbegne opasnost, jež savija svoje telo u kuglu (da bi zaštitio glavu, stopala i stomak) i uperi svoje bodlje prema grabljivici.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.

Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

species_en: Red deer, Roe deer, Fallow deer
description_en: The red deer is one of the biggest deer species. Adult deer measures 4 feet at the shoulder height. They are migratory species in that they move to higher habitats in summer where the food is abundant. However in winter red deer prefer to live in lower wooded terrains. The Roe Deer is a smaller deer. In the summer its fur is reddish-brown, in the winter it is greyish brown or dark brown. Fawns have a reddish-brown fur, with white spots on their back and sides.Fallow deer are very fast runners. They can achieve a speed of 30 miles per hour in short bursts. They can also jump 5.8 feet high above the ground.
description_sb: Crveni jelen (ili samo jelen) je jedna od najvećih vrsta jelena. Odrasli primerci mere oko 1.2 metra u visini ramena. Oni su migratorne vrste, leti se sele na viša staništa gde ima hrane u izobilju. Međutim, zimi vole da žive u nižim šumovitim terenima. Srna je manja vrsta jelena. Leti je krzno crvenkasto-smeđe, zimi sivkasto smeđe ili tamno smeđe boje. Jeleni imaju crvenkasto-smeđe krzno, sa belim mrljama na leđima i bokovima. Jeleni lopatari su vrlo brzi trkači. U kratkim rafalima mogu postići brzinu od 50 kilometara na sat I skočiti 1,8 metara visoko iznad zemlje.

description_en: Rats take care of injured and sick rats in their group. Rats have excellent memories.Rats are extremely clean animals, spending several hours every day grooming themselves and their group members. They are less likely than cats or dogs to catch and transmit parasites and viruses. A rat can go longer than a camel without having a drink of water. Nutria is excellent swimmer that can spend 5 minutes under water without returning to the surface to breathe. Nutria has huge appetite. It can eat 25% of its own weight every day.
description_sb: Pacovi se brinu o povređenim i bolesnim pacovima u svojoj grupi. Oni imaju izvrsno pamćenje. Izuzetno su čiste životinje, svakodnevno provode nekoliko sati doterujući sebe i članove svoje grupe. Manja je verovatnoća da će oni dobiti i preneti parazite i viruse od mačaka ili pasa. Pacov može da izdrzi duže od kamile bez vodu. Nutria je odličan plivač koji može provesti 5 minuta pod vodom, a da se ne vrati na površinu da bi disao. Nutria ima ogroman apetit, svakodnevno može da pojede 25% sopstvene težine.

description_en: The brown bear can reach a weight of between 330 and 815 pounds. Despite their weight, bears cover short distances at speeds of up to 31 mph. At birth, bear cubs are blind and naked. In the wild, these omnivores spend up to 16 hours per day looking for food. Bears have a particularly good nose: their sense of smell enables them to sniff food at a distance of several miles. The brown bear is the largest predator still living on the continent of Europe.
description_sb: Mrki medved može dostići težinu između 330 i 815 kilograma. Uprkos težini, medvedi prelaze kratke razdaljine brzinom do 50 kilo,etara na sat. Po rođenju medvedići su slepi i goli. U divljini ovi svaštojedi dnevno provodu i do 16 sati tražeći hranu. Medvedi imaju posebno dobar nos: njuh im omogućava da njuškaju hranu na udaljenosti od nekoliko kilometara. Mrki medved je najveći predator koji još uvek živi na evropskom kontinentu.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: Norway maples have dense shallow roots and produce heavy shade that prevents grass from growing under them. Occasionally, the roots will even choke the parent tree. The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: Norway maples have dense shallow roots and produce heavy shade that prevents grass from growing under them. Occasionally, the roots will even choke the parent tree. The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: Badger is active during the night. Their diet is based on earthworms, insects, slugs, fruit, berries and bulbs. Badger can run short distances at the speed of 19 miles per hour. They are social animals that live in groups, called clans (or cete), of 2 to 15 animals. Badger digs underground burrows called "setts" that consist of network of tunnels and chambers that are used for resting and rearing of young. 6 animals usually share one sett. Some setts in the wild are centuries old and still in use.
description_sb: Jazavac je aktivan tokom noći. Njihova ishrana zasniva se na glistama, insektima, puževima, voću, bobicama i lukovicama. Jazavac može trčati na kratke staze brzinom od 30 kilometara na sat. To su društvene životinje koje žive u grupama, zvanim klanovi, od 2 do 15 životinja. Jazavac kopa podzemne jame koje se sastoje od mreže tunela i komora koje služe za odmor i uzgoj mladunaca. 6 životinja obično deli jedno naselje. Neke jazbine u divljini su stare vekovima i još uvek se koriste.

description_en: Hedgehog has elongated snout and body covered with 5000 to 6500 quills. It covers its quills with foamy saliva after exposure to strong, unpleasant smell or taste. Hedgehog has poor eyesight, but excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food. Its diet is based on insects, centipedes, mice, slugs, snails, caterpillars, frogs, mushrooms and berries. Hedgehog is fast animal, agile climber and good swimmer. When it cannot escape from a danger, hedgehog curls its body into a ball (to protect head, feet and belly) and exposes its quills toward the predator.
description_sb: Jež ima iduženu njušku I telo koje je pokriveno sa 5000 do 6500 bodlji. Bodlje prekriva penušavom pljuvačkom nakon izlaganja jakom, neprijatnom, mirisu ili ukusu. Jež ima loš vid, ali izuzetno čulo sluha I mirisa koje mu olakšavaju potragu hanom. Njegova ishrana s zasniva se na insektima, stonogama, miševima, puževima, gusenicama, žabama, pečurkama i bobicama. Jež je brza životinja, spretan penjač i dobar plivač. Kada ne može da izbegne opasnost, jež savija svoje telo u kuglu (da bi zaštitio glavu, stopala i stomak) i uperi svoje bodlje prema grabljivici.

species_en: Red deer, Roe deer, Fallow deer
description_en: The red deer is one of the biggest deer species. Adult deer measures 4 feet at the shoulder height. They are migratory species in that they move to higher habitats in summer where the food is abundant. However in winter red deer prefer to live in lower wooded terrains. The Roe Deer is a smaller deer. In the summer its fur is reddish-brown, in the winter it is greyish brown or dark brown. Fawns have a reddish-brown fur, with white spots on their back and sides.Fallow deer are very fast runners. They can achieve a speed of 30 miles per hour in short bursts. They can also jump 5.8 feet high above the ground.
description_sb: Crveni jelen (ili samo jelen) je jedna od najvećih vrsta jelena. Odrasli primerci mere oko 1.2 metra u visini ramena. Oni su migratorne vrste, leti se sele na viša staništa gde ima hrane u izobilju. Međutim, zimi vole da žive u nižim šumovitim terenima. Srna je manja vrsta jelena. Leti je krzno crvenkasto-smeđe, zimi sivkasto smeđe ili tamno smeđe boje. Jeleni imaju crvenkasto-smeđe krzno, sa belim mrljama na leđima i bokovima. Jeleni lopatari su vrlo brzi trkači. U kratkim rafalima mogu postići brzinu od 50 kilometara na sat I skočiti 1,8 metara visoko iznad zemlje.

description_en: Red squirrels are not always red; sometimes they can be black, brown or even white in colour. Baby red squirrels are called kittens. Red squirrels can swim and hang upside down! Reds don’t hibernate; in winter they rely on food that they have previously buried and they can locate their food supplies in over 1 foot of snow.
description_sb: Crvene veverice nisu uvek crvene; ponekad mogu biti crne, smeđe ili čak bele boje. Bebe crvene veverice zovu se mačići. Crvene veverice mogu plivati i visiti naopačke! Ne hiberniraju; zimi se oslanjaju na hranu koju su prethodno zakopali i zalihe hrane mogu da pronađu u snegu dubokom preko 30 centimetara.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.
description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: Hare can leap up to 10 feet and reach the speed of 35 to 40 miles per hour thanks to its long, strong hind legs. It is also excellent swimmer. Its diet is based on the grass, fern, seed and vegetables. Hare has excellent senses of hearing and smell which facilitate detection of food and predators.
description_sb: Zec može da skoči do 3 metra i postigne brzinu od 55 do 65 kilometara na sat zahvaljujući dugim, snažnim zadnjim nogama. Takođe je odličan plivač. Njegova se ishrana zasniva na travi, paprati, semenu i povrću. Zec ima izvrsna čula sluha i mirisa koja olakšavaju otkrivanje hrane i grabljivica.

description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: Eagle has large eyes with very large pupils. It has 5 times more light-sensitive cells in the eyes than humans and ability to recognize 5 basic colors (humans can recognize only 3). Thanks to its keen eyesight, eagle can spot small and well-camouflaged prey (such as rabbit) from a distance of nearly two miles. Eagle is a carnivore. Its diet is based on lizards, small mammals, fish and carrion. Eagle "lands" on the prey at the speed of 150 miles per hour and kills it with its sharp claws and beak.
description_sb: Orao ima velike oči sa vrlo velikim zenicama. Ima 5 puta više ćelija osetljivih na svetlost u očima od ljudi i sposobnost prepoznavanja 5 osnovnih boja (ljudi mogu prepoznati samo 3). Zahvaljujući izoštrenom vidu, orao može uočiti mali i dobro zakamufliran plen (poput zeca) sa udaljenosti od tri kilometara. Orao je mesožder. Njegova ishrana zasniva se na gušterima, malim sisarima, ribi i strvini. Orao „sleće“ na plen brzinom od 240 kilometara na sat i ubija ga oštrim kandžama i kljunom.

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: Pelican has the largest bill of all birds. It can reach 18 inches in length. Underneath the bill, pelicans have throat pouch that can hold 3 gallons of water. Pouch is mainly used for feeding, but it can be also used as a cooling "device". During the warm days, pelican will swing its pouch to cool itself. Pelicans are heavy birds, but thanks to air sacs in their bones - buoyancy is not a problem. They can fly to the height of 10 000 feet using the warm wind currents.
description_sb: Pelikan ima najveći kljun od svih ptica. Može dostići 50 centimetara u dužinu. Ispod kljuna, pelikani imaju rasregljivu kožnu kesu u koju stane 3 litre vode. Kesa se uglavnom koristi za hranjenje, ali se može koristiti i kao „uređaj“ za hlađenje. Tokom toplih dana, pelikan će zamahnuti keson kako bi se ohladio. Pelikani su teške ptice, ali zahvaljujući vazdušnim vrećicama u kostima - uzgon ne predstavlja problem. Mogu da polete do visine od 3 kilometra koristeći tople vetrove.

Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: Eagle has large eyes with very large pupils. It has 5 times more light-sensitive cells in the eyes than humans and ability to recognize 5 basic colors (humans can recognize only 3). Thanks to its keen eyesight, eagle can spot small and well-camouflaged prey (such as rabbit) from a distance of nearly two miles. Eagle is a carnivore. Its diet is based on lizards, small mammals, fish and carrion. Eagle "lands" on the prey at the speed of 150 miles per hour and kills it with its sharp claws and beak.
description_sb: Orao ima velike oči sa vrlo velikim zenicama. Ima 5 puta više ćelija osetljivih na svetlost u očima od ljudi i sposobnost prepoznavanja 5 osnovnih boja (ljudi mogu prepoznati samo 3). Zahvaljujući izoštrenom vidu, orao može uočiti mali i dobro zakamufliran plen (poput zeca) sa udaljenosti od tri kilometara. Orao je mesožder. Njegova ishrana zasniva se na gušterima, malim sisarima, ribi i strvini. Orao „sleće“ na plen brzinom od 240 kilometara na sat i ubija ga oštrim kandžama i kljunom.

The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.
description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: Eagle has large eyes with very large pupils. It has 5 times more light-sensitive cells in the eyes than humans and ability to recognize 5 basic colors (humans can recognize only 3). Thanks to its keen eyesight, eagle can spot small and well-camouflaged prey (such as rabbit) from a distance of nearly two miles. Eagle is a carnivore. Its diet is based on lizards, small mammals, fish and carrion. Eagle "lands" on the prey at the speed of 150 miles per hour and kills it with its sharp claws and beak.
description_sb: Orao ima velike oči sa vrlo velikim zenicama. Ima 5 puta više ćelija osetljivih na svetlost u očima od ljudi i sposobnost prepoznavanja 5 osnovnih boja (ljudi mogu prepoznati samo 3). Zahvaljujući izoštrenom vidu, orao može uočiti mali i dobro zakamufliran plen (poput zeca) sa udaljenosti od tri kilometara. Orao je mesožder. Njegova ishrana zasniva se na gušterima, malim sisarima, ribi i strvini. Orao „sleće“ na plen brzinom od 240 kilometara na sat i ubija ga oštrim kandžama i kljunom.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.
description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: Eagle has large eyes with very large pupils. It has 5 times more light-sensitive cells in the eyes than humans and ability to recognize 5 basic colors (humans can recognize only 3). Thanks to its keen eyesight, eagle can spot small and well-camouflaged prey (such as rabbit) from a distance of nearly two miles. Eagle is a carnivore. Its diet is based on lizards, small mammals, fish and carrion. Eagle "lands" on the prey at the speed of 150 miles per hour and kills it with its sharp claws and beak.
description_sb: Orao ima velike oči sa vrlo velikim zenicama. Ima 5 puta više ćelija osetljivih na svetlost u očima od ljudi i sposobnost prepoznavanja 5 osnovnih boja (ljudi mogu prepoznati samo 3). Zahvaljujući izoštrenom vidu, orao može uočiti mali i dobro zakamufliran plen (poput zeca) sa udaljenosti od tri kilometara. Orao je mesožder. Njegova ishrana zasniva se na gušterima, malim sisarima, ribi i strvini. Orao „sleće“ na plen brzinom od 240 kilometara na sat i ubija ga oštrim kandžama i kljunom.

description_en: Red squirrels are not always red; sometimes they can be black, brown or even white in colour. Baby red squirrels are called kittens. Red squirrels can swim and hang upside down! Reds don’t hibernate; in winter they rely on food that they have previously buried and they can locate their food supplies in over 1 foot of snow.
description_sb: Crvene veverice nisu uvek crvene; ponekad mogu biti crne, smeđe ili čak bele boje. Bebe crvene veverice zovu se mačići. Crvene veverice mogu plivati i visiti naopačke! Ne hiberniraju; zimi se oslanjaju na hranu koju su prethodno zakopali i zalihe hrane mogu da pronađu u snegu dubokom preko 30 centimetara.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: Foxes share some similarities with cats. They have retractable claws (which can be pulled inside the paws) and vertical pupils. Foxes see well at dim light. Besides good night eyesight, foxes have excellent sense of smell and hearing. They use these senses to detect the prey. Foxes prefer meat and they will readily hunt birds (including poultry), rodents, small mammals and reptiles. They are also able to dig and eat human waste and different types of fruit and berries. Foxes can run very fast (up to 30 miles per hour) thanks to their slender body.
description_sb: Lisice dele neke sličnosti sa mačkama. Imaju uvlačne kandže (koje se mogu uvući unutar šapa) i vertikalne zenice. Lisice dobro vide pri slabom svetlu. Osim lakog, lisice imaju i odličan njuh i sluh. Ova čula koriste za otkrivanje plena. Lisice vole meso i stoga će loviti ptice (uključujući živinu), glodare, male sisare i gmizavce. Takođe su u stanju da kopaju i jedu ljudski otpad i različite vrste voća i bobica. Lisice mogu trčati vrlo brzo (do 50 kilometara na sat) zahvaljujući vitkom telu.

species_en: Red deer, Roe deer, Fallow deer
description_en: The red deer is one of the biggest deer species. Adult deer measures 4 feet at the shoulder height. They are migratory species in that they move to higher habitats in summer where the food is abundant. However in winter red deer prefer to live in lower wooded terrains. The Roe Deer is a smaller deer. In the summer its fur is reddish-brown, in the winter it is greyish brown or dark brown. Fawns have a reddish-brown fur, with white spots on their back and sides.Fallow deer are very fast runners. They can achieve a speed of 30 miles per hour in short bursts. They can also jump 5.8 feet high above the ground.
description_sb: Crveni jelen (ili samo jelen) je jedna od najvećih vrsta jelena. Odrasli primerci mere oko 1.2 metra u visini ramena. Oni su migratorne vrste, leti se sele na viša staništa gde ima hrane u izobilju. Međutim, zimi vole da žive u nižim šumovitim terenima. Srna je manja vrsta jelena. Leti je krzno crvenkasto-smeđe, zimi sivkasto smeđe ili tamno smeđe boje. Jeleni imaju crvenkasto-smeđe krzno, sa belim mrljama na leđima i bokovima. Jeleni lopatari su vrlo brzi trkači. U kratkim rafalima mogu postići brzinu od 50 kilometara na sat I skočiti 1,8 metara visoko iznad zemlje.

description_en: Wild boar can reach 3 to 6.5 feet in length, 21.6 to 39.3 inches in height and 90 to 700 pounds in weight. It has long, rubbery snout that is used for digging of underground roots and bulbs. It feeds mainly on the seed, fruits, leaves, berries, eggs, mice, lizards, worms and snakes. Wild boars are nocturnal animals. They will spend 12h in sleep during the day, hidden in the nests made of leaves.
description_sb: Divlja svinja može dostići dižinu od 0,9 do 2 metra, visinu od 0,5 do 1 metra i težinu od 40 do 317 kilograma. Ima dugačku gumenastu njušku kojom iskopava podzemne iskopava korene i lukovice. Uglavnom sehrani semenjem, voćem, lišćem, bovicama, jajima, miševima, gušterima, crvima i zmijama. Tokom dana provedu i do 12 sati spavajući sakrivene u gnezdu napravljenom od lišća.

Ima dugačku gumenastu njušku kojom iskopava podzemne iskopava korene i lukovice. Uglavnom sehrani semenjem, voćem, lišćem, bovicama, jajima, miševima, gušterima, crvima i zmijama. Tokom dana provedu i do 12 sati spavajući sakrivene u gnezdu napravljenom od lišća.

species_en: Red deer, Roe deer, Fallow deer
description_en: The red deer is one of the biggest deer species. Adult deer measures 4 feet at the shoulder height. They are migratory species in that they move to higher habitats in summer where the food is abundant. However in winter red deer prefer to live in lower wooded terrains. The Roe Deer is a smaller deer. In the summer its fur is reddish-brown, in the winter it is greyish brown or dark brown. Fawns have a reddish-brown fur, with white spots on their back and sides.Fallow deer are very fast runners. They can achieve a speed of 30 miles per hour in short bursts. They can also jump 5.8 feet high above the ground.
description_sb: Crveni jelen (ili samo jelen) je jedna od najvećih vrsta jelena. Odrasli primerci mere oko 1.2 metra u visini ramena. Oni su migratorne vrste, leti se sele na viša staništa gde ima hrane u izobilju. Međutim, zimi vole da žive u nižim šumovitim terenima. Srna je manja vrsta jelena. Leti je krzno crvenkasto-smeđe, zimi sivkasto smeđe ili tamno smeđe boje. Jeleni imaju crvenkasto-smeđe krzno, sa belim mrljama na leđima i bokovima. Jeleni lopatari su vrlo brzi trkači. U kratkim rafalima mogu postići brzinu od 50 kilometara na sat I skočiti 1,8 metara visoko iznad zemlje.

description_en: The European roller is the only member of the roller family of birds to breed in Europe. The European roller is found in a wide variety of habitats, avoiding only treeless plains. Rollers often perch prominently on trees, posts or overhead wires, like giant shrikes, whilst watching for the large insects, small reptiles, rodents and frogs that they eat.
description_sb: Modrovrana je jedini član modrovrana valjaka ptica koji se razmnožavaju u Evropi. Modrovrana se može u rayličitim staništima, izbegavajući samo ravnice bez drveća. Ona se često smeštaju na istaknuto mesto na drveću, stubovima ili nadzemnim žicama, poput džinovskih svraka, dok gledaju kako jedu velike insekte, male gmizavce, glodare i žabe.

description_en: The Eurasian Curlew is the largest wading bird found in Europe. They eat mostly worms, crabs and invertebrates, which they find by touch using their long curved bill to probe soft mud. The species is threatened due to loss and fragmentation of moorland and grassland habitats. Eurasian curlews used to be eaten, and appeared in several recipe books. They were once so common in Cornwall they were served in pies. In fact, up until 1942, you could still buy curlews in UK butchers.
description_sb: Evroazijski carska šljuka je najveća ptica močvarica pronađena u Evropi. One uglavnom jedu crve, rakove i beskičmenjake, koje pronalaze dodirom koristeći svoj dugačke zakrivljene kljunove za traženje u mekom blatu. Vrsta je ugrožena zbog gubitka i usitnjavanja močvarnih i travnatih staništa. Nekada su često nalazile na meniju pa su se pojavile u nekoliko knjiga sa receptima. Bile su toliko česti u Kornvolu da su ih posluživali u pitama. Do 1942. godine su se još uvek mogle kupiti u mesarama Velike Britanije.

description_en: Root, seed, mature stem and leaves of pokeweed are poisonous for humans and livestock (all parts of the plant that are tinged with red should be avoided).Young shoots and leaves of pokeweed (harvested in the spring) can be boiled and consumed as leafy vegetables. Pokeweed is good source of proteins, vitamins A, C, B1, B2, B3 and B6 and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and iron. Berries were used for the preparation of pies and jellies in the past. Raw berries are toxic. They have to be exposed to high temperatures to ensure destruction of all harmful compounds.
description_sb: Koren, seme, zrela stabljika i lišće vinobojke otrovne su za ljude i stoku (treba izbegavati sve delove biljke koji su obojeni crvenom bojom). Mladi izdanci i listovi (ubrani u proleće) mogu se kuvati i konzumirati kao lisnato povrće. Vinobojka je dobar izvor proteina, vitamina A, C, B1, B2, B3 i B6 i minerala kao što su kalcijum, fosfor, magnezijum i gvožđe. Bobice su se u prošlosti koristile za pripremu pita i želea. Sirove bobice su otrovne. Moraju biti izloženi visokim temperaturama kako bi se osiguralo uništavanje svih štetnih jedinjenja.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi

description_en: Norway maples have dense shallow roots and produce heavy shade that prevents grass from growing under them. Occasionally, the roots will even choke the parent tree. The Norway maple out-competes native vegetation. Maple produces winged seed which moves like a helicopter when it falls from the trees. The Norway maple is an excellent tree for cities, as it is highly tolerant of smoke and dust.
description_sb: Norveški javorovi imaju guste plitke korene i proizvode jaku hladovinu koja sprečava rast trave ispod njih. Povremeno će korenje čak i zadaviti matično drvo. Norveški javor nadmašuje domaću vegetaciju. Javor daje krilato seme koje se kreće poput helikoptera kada padne sa drveća. zvrsno drvo za gradove, jer izuzetno podnosi dim i prašinu.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Badger is active during the night. Their diet is based on earthworms, insects, slugs, fruit, berries and bulbs. Badger can run short distances at the speed of 19 miles per hour. They are social animals that live in groups, called clans (or cete), of 2 to 15 animals. Badger digs underground burrows called "setts" that consist of network of tunnels and chambers that are used for resting and rearing of young. 6 animals usually share one sett. Some setts in the wild are centuries old and still in use.
description_sb: Jazavac je aktivan tokom noći. Njihova ishrana zasniva se na glistama, insektima, puževima, voću, bobicama i lukovicama. Jazavac može trčati na kratke staze brzinom od 30 kilometara na sat. To su društvene životinje koje žive u grupama, zvanim klanovi, od 2 do 15 životinja. Jazavac kopa podzemne jame koje se sastoje od mreže tunela i komora koje služe za odmor i uzgoj mladunaca. 6 životinja obično deli jedno naselje. Neke jazbine u divljini su stare vekovima i još uvek se koriste.

species_en: Red deer, Roe deer, Fallow deer
description_en: The red deer is one of the biggest deer species. Adult deer measures 4 feet at the shoulder height. They are migratory species in that they move to higher habitats in summer where the food is abundant. However in winter red deer prefer to live in lower wooded terrains. The Roe Deer is a smaller deer. In the summer its fur is reddish-brown, in the winter it is greyish brown or dark brown. Fawns have a reddish-brown fur, with white spots on their back and sides.Fallow deer are very fast runners. They can achieve a speed of 30 miles per hour in short bursts. They can also jump 5.8 feet high above the ground.
description_sb: Crveni jelen (ili samo jelen) je jedna od najvećih vrsta jelena. Odrasli primerci mere oko 1.2 metra u visini ramena. Oni su migratorne vrste, leti se sele na viša staništa gde ima hrane u izobilju. Međutim, zimi vole da žive u nižim šumovitim terenima. Srna je manja vrsta jelena. Leti je krzno crvenkasto-smeđe, zimi sivkasto smeđe ili tamno smeđe boje. Jeleni imaju crvenkasto-smeđe krzno, sa belim mrljama na leđima i bokovima. Jeleni lopatari su vrlo brzi trkači. U kratkim rafalima mogu postići brzinu od 50 kilometara na sat I skočiti 1,8 metara visoko iznad zemlje.

description_en: European ground squirrel eats a primarily herbivorous diet made up of grasses, roots, and seeds, along with some insects, which they carry in their cheeks to eat in the safety of the den. During foraging, some individuals act as sentinels, alerting the colony to danger with a whistling call. Unfortunately, the European ground squirrel is threatened and has declined or disappeared over much of its range.
description_sb: Evropska veverica je prvenstveno biljojed, ishrana joj se sastoji od trava, korena i semena, zajedno sa nekim insektima, koje nose u obrazima da bi ih jeli u sigurnim jazbinama. Tokom traženja hrane, neke jedinke imaju ulogu stražara, zviždukom upozoravajući koloniju na opasnost. Na žalost, evropska zemaljska veverica je ugrožena i njena populacija je opala ili nestala sa većeg dela svog staništa.

description_en: When the black locust has been introduced to a new environment, it tends to compete with native species and take over in that environment. This tree has many uses for humans as well! The black locust has served ornamental purposes, and on top of that, it has been planted to prevent soil erosion. It is also a nitrogen fixer, so besides being planted to keep soil in place, it is planted to help enrich soil too.
description_sb: Kada je bagrem uveden u novo okruženje, on se takmiči sa domaćim vrstama i preuzima vlast u tom okruženju. Ovo drvo ima višestruku koristi za ljude! Bagrem služi kao ukras, a povrh toga sadi se da spreči eroziju tla. Takođe je sredstvo za učvršćivanje azota, pa je pored toga što je zasađen kako bi održalao zemlju na mestu, posađen je i da pomogne obogaćivanju tla.

description_en: Chicory blooms from July to October. Each flower lasts only one day. Flowers can be seen only during the sunny days. Chicory has slightly bitter and spicy taste. Leaves can be consumed fresh as salad or cooked, roasted and grilled. Taproot of chicory contains inulin, a polysaccharide that can be used as sweetener or a substitute for sucrose. Chicory can be used in treatment of gallstones, gastrointestinal disorders, cuts and bruises in people
description_sb: Cikorija cveta od jula do oktobra. Svaki cvet traje samo jedan dan. Cveće se može videti samo tokom sunčanih dana. Cikorija je blago gorkastog i začinjenog ukusa. Listovi se mogu jesti sveži kao salata ili kuvani, pečeni i pečeni na roštilju. Koren cikorije sadrži inulin, polisaharid koji se može koristiti kao zaslađivač ili zamena za saharozu. Cikorija se može koristiti u lečenju kamenaca u žuči, gastrointestinalnih poremećaja, posekotina i modrica kod ljudi
